dcterms:creator: C. von der Burchard
H. Uzunova
T. Kepp
H. Handels
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of Spectralis-OCT and Home-OCT images featuring 38 subjects diagnosed with eye diseases, particularly neovascular age-related macular degeneration (AMD). The dataset includes annotations for subretinal fluids (SRF) and pigment epithelial detachment (PED) by a clinical expert, as well as automatic annotations for the vitreous body and choroid.
dcterms:title: Spectralis-OCT and Home-OCT images
